titles.title: A resolution designating September 13, 2011, as "National Celiac Disease Awareness Day".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/7/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates September 13, 2011, as National Celiac Disease Awareness Day.
